content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/jacocoxmlparser is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

My plan:
1. First, view the repository structure
2. Look at the pom.xml to understand the project structure and dependencies
3. Update the Java version to 17
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to check if everything works
6. Fix any issues that arise
7. Keep iterating until `mvn clean verify` succeeds

Let's start!

File content displayed in console.
Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>uk.co.alt236</groupId>
    <artifactId>jacocoxmlparser</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.2</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>1.8</source>
                    <target>1.8</target>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>0.8.3</version>

                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                    <execution>
                        <id>generate-code-coverage-report</id>
                        <phase>test</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>report</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <!-- Build an executable JAR -->
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.1.0</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <phase>package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>shade</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>

                <configuration>
                    <dependencyReducedPomLocation>${project.build.directory}/dependency-reduced-pom.xml
                    </dependencyReducedPomLocation>

                    <transformers>
                        <transformer
                                implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer">
                            <manifestEntries>
                                <Main-Class>uk.co.alt236.jacocoxmlparser.Main</Main-Class>
                            </manifestEntries>
                        </transformer>
                    </transformers>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.0.2</version>
                <configuration>
                    <archive>
                        <manifest>
                            <addDefaultImplementationEntries>true</addDefaultImplementationEntries>
                            <addDefaultSpecificationEntries>true</addDefaultSpecificationEntries>
                        </manifest>
                    </archive>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>

        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.0-M3</version>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>commons-cli</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-cli</artifactId>
            <version>1.4</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <version>4.12</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-all</artifactId>
            <version>2.0.2-beta</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.findbugs</groupId>
            <artifactId>jsr305</artifactId>
            <version>3.0.2</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.sun.xml.bind</groupId>
            <artifactId>jaxb-impl</artifactId>
            <version>2.3.2</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.glassfish.jaxb</groupId>
            <artifactId>jaxb-core</artifactId>
            <version>2.3.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.sun.activation</groupId>
            <artifactId>javax.activation</artifactId>
            <version>1.2.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
            <version>3.8.1</version>
        </dependency>

    </dependencies>
</project>

    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <artifactId>jacocoxmlparser</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.11.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>17</source>
                    <target>17</target>

Perfect! The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 is complete and successful. Here's a summary of what was done:

## Migration Summary

### 1. **Updated pom.xml**:
   - Set Java version from 1.8 to 17 in properties and compiler plugin
   - Updated maven-compiler-plugin from 3.2 to 3.11.0
   - Updated jacoco-maven-plugin from 0.8.3 to 0.8.11
   - Updated maven-shade-plugin from 3.1.0 to 3.5.1
   - Updated maven-jar-plugin from 3.0.2 to 3.3.0
   - Updated maven-surefire-plugin from 3.0.0-M3 to 3.2.2

### 2. **Updated Dependencies**:
   - commons-cli: 1.4 → 1.6.0
   - junit: 4.12 → 4.13.2
   - mockito-all: 2.0.2-beta → mockito-core: 5.8.0
   - jaxb-impl: 2.3.2 → 4.0.4
   - jaxb-core: 2.3.0 → 4.0.4
   - javax.activation: 1.2.0 → jakarta.activation-api: 2.1.2
   - commons-lang3: 3.8.1 → 3.14.0

### 3. **Migrated JAXB Imports**:
   Updated all Java source files from `javax.xml.bind.*` to `jakarta.xml.bind.*` to comply with Java 11+ requirements:
   - Report.java
   - Package.java
   - Counter.java
   - Method.java
   - Clazz.java
   - ReportParser.java

### Result:
✅ All tests pass (9 tests, 0 failures)
✅ Build succeeds with Java 17
✅ `mvn clean verify` completes successfully
